description:
Bat meets Fudo, the kind giant who has a dark past that teaches kindergarten and all of the girls of DD go on a girls` night out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: He is as Firm as a Rock! Fudo Moves! \ What is a Girls` Night Out? We`d Like to Ask You!
Ugokazaru Koto Yama no Gotoshi Fudou Ugoku! / Joshikai to wa Nanika! Omaetachi ni Toute Mitai
動かざることヤマのごとし フドウ動く! / 女子会とは何か! おまえたちに問うてみたい
